0.text: Innate: Morgana  heals herself for 18% of the post-mitigation damage dealt by her abilities against  champions, large  minions, and medium and large  monsters.
Active: Morgana throws a sphere of dark magic in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hits and  roots them for a duration.
Passive: Tormented Shadow's current cooldown is  reduced by 5% of the maximum whenever  Soul Siphon triggers. Simultaneous triggers from multiple targets will stack the cooldown reduction.

1.text: Active: Morgana desecrates the target area for 5 seconds, which deals magic damage instantly as well as every 0.5 seconds to enemies within, increased by 0% − 170% (based on target's missing health). Tormented Soil deals 155% damage against non-epic  monsters.

0.text: Active: Morgana  shields the target allied  champion or herself for 5 seconds, which absorbs magic damage and grants  crowd control immunity while the shield holds.

Active: Morgana latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions over the cast time, dealing magic damage and forming a  tether between herself and each target for 3 seconds, during which the targets are  revealed and  slowed by 20%.

1.text: Morgana gains  bonus movement speed when moving towards enemies tethered to her.

2.text: If a target maintains the tether after its duration, they are dealt the same magic damage again, becoming  revealed and  stunned for 1.5 seconds.

3.text: A nearby enemy champion is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be  visible to be tethered by this ability.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8 ability power
+10 health
+50% base mana regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Tribute: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Frostfang, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TRIBUTE: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants  20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Torment: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 50 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters. 」「 6.25 (+ 0.75% AP) (+ 0.5% target's maximum health) magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 4 seconds, capped at 50 against monsters. 」
Unique – Agony: Deal 0% − 12% (based on target's bonus health) bonus magic damage against enemy champions.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TORMENT: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 50 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters. 」

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).

0.concerningText: Active: Morgana throws a sphere of dark magic in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hits and  roots them for a duration.
Active: Morgana throws a sphere of dark magic in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hits and  roots them for a duration.

Active: Morgana desecrates the target area for 5 seconds, which deals magic damage instantly as well as every 0.5 seconds to enemies within, increased by 0% − 170% (based on target's missing health). Tormented Soil deals 155% damage against non-epic  monsters.
Active: Morgana  shields the target allied  champion or herself for 5 seconds, which absorbs magic damage and grants  crowd control immunity while the shield holds.
